info.title: REST API for Oracle Process Cloud Service

tags.name: Manage Processes
tags.description: Create and retrieve information about process instances.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Process priority from 1 (highest) to 5 (lowest) or Any (default)

parameters.name: dueDateFrom
parameters.description: Start of due date range in the format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

parameters.name: dueDateTo
parameters.description: End of due date range in the format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items per page, between 1 and 100, default 25

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index for the first item on a page of list items

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field with which results are to be ordered

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Returned items must be created or updated later than the specified time, format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Returned items must be created or updated before the specified time, format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

post.description: Creates a new process instance or saves a process instance based on the value of action in the input. The resource takes a multipart input if looking to create a process instance with attachments - JSON as first body  part and attachments as the remaining body parts. The process instance can also be created with only JSON payload to create a process instance if attachments are not needed. The operation and serviceName values in the input payload are optional - if not specified 'operation' defaults to 'start'.

put.summary: Perform Actions on List of Instances.

parameters.name: isProcessNumberFlag
parameters.description: Value of processNumber, if true it will fetch process instance by number, if false it will return process instance by instanceId

put.description: Updates the state of the  process to the action value.

get.summary: Retrieve Attachment List for a Process Instance.
get.description: Retrieves a list of attachments for a process instance.

get.summary: Retrieve Audit Diagram of Process Instance.
get.description: Retrieves the audit diagram of a process instance.

parameters.name: graphic
parameters.description: Value of graphic mode, true for png output, false for histories

get.summary: Retrieve Comment List for a Process Instance.
get.description: Retrieves a list of comments for a process instance.

get.summary: Retrieve Conversations for a Process Instance
get.description: Retrieves the conversations associated with the process instance.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieves only the conversation for the specified conversation name

200.description: Success. Returns the conversations or empty list when there aren't any.

500.description: Error in retrieving the conversation information

get.summary: Retrieve a Conversation for a Process Instance
get.description: Retrieve conversations associated with the process instance based on conversationId.

200.description: Success. Returns the conversations or empty list when there aren't any.

500.description: Error in retrieving the conversation information

get.summary: Retrieve list of DOCs Folders for a Process
get.description: Retrieves the DOCs folders associated with a process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieves only the folder for the specified folder name

get.summary: Retrieve DOCs Folder for a Process
get.description: Retrieves the folder details for a given folder associated with a process.
